ActorTalk: What a surprise. I just got back from a mission, and here you are, Commandant!
What, Nikola too busy for my report and sent you instead?
I knew you'd be on this flight.
I still have a mission to finish. I'll get going.
See? This dock connects everywhere, and it's right by the Commercial District. Running into someone isn't strange at all... especially someone as unpredictable as you, Commandant.
Don't tell me you came here just to...
Don't read too much into it. The last mission is still under review, and the next one hasn't been assigned. I just came here to relax.
Why so curious about my schedule? Don't tell me you're off-duty too?
Then how about sharing some of this free time with me? Keep me company?
I saw it on the transport schedule.
That's thoughtful. But you didn't come here just to chat, did you?
Some new shops opened in the Commercial District. I think you'll like them.
Sounds good. I just finished my report and have nothing to do. I'm curious to see where you'll take me.
If your choice isn't good enough, be ready for a little punishment, Commandant.
What a coincidence. I also need to report in, so no time to chat. See you next time.
